alert.note: Alert for Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Piscataquis and north central Penobscot Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of South Branch Pond, or 21 miles north of Mount Katahdin, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baxter State Park and Grand Lake Matagamon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
